# Overview

This is a repository of event logs from *decentralized applications* (DApps) deployed on public blockchain networks. 
All datasets included in this collection provide logs in the [IEEE XES standard](https://www.tf-pm.org/resources/xes-standard/about-xes).
At the moment, logs for the following DApps:

- [Augur](#augur)
- [Forsage](#forsage)
- [CryptoKitties](#cryptokitties)
- [ChickenHunt](#chickenhunt)
